description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Gingerbread & White Choc Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Gingerbread & White Choc Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease base and sides of a round 22cm springform pan.

Place biscuits in a food processor and process until fine crumbs. With the motor running, add butter and process until just combined. Press the biscuit mixture evenly over base and sides of prepared pan. Place in refrigerator to chill.
Place gelatine and water in a small bowl and stir until gelatine dissolves. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes.
Melt the white melts according to packet instructions.

Place cream cheese and condensed milk in a medium bowl and beat, using an electric mixer, until smooth. Add cream, gelatine mixture, melted white choc, ground ginger and mixed spice. Beat until just combined and pour into prepared pan. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight until set.
Drizzle cake with melted dark chocolate and serve.
